content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 1, of, the fraction with numerator 6 x plus 2, and denominator open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 x plus 1, close parenthesis, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 2 times the natural log of 2, plus, 2 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 times the natural log of 2, minus, the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 times the natural log of 2, minus, 2 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 times the natural log of 2, minus, 4 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4 times the natural log of 2, minus, the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
